column4: so XBMC froze and I can't access unity, issues a kill (through ssh), but everything is stuck, tried "unity" (still stuck). am I missing out on a command here?

restarting the whole machine is not much of a solution to me, I guess, because it happens too often that xbmc will freeze. was trying to figure out a way to properly terminate unity and restart it...?
get the output of 'pstree' so we can see what processes are still running.
